prompts: Create a graceful fairy-type Pokemon that embodies elegance and psychic powers.
I want a psychic Pokemon with flowing garments and a serene expression.
Generate a humanoid creature with a beautiful dress and a kind demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that radiates calm energy with green and white colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that protects others with its psychic abilities and gentle nature.
Design a Pokemon with a distinctive head shape and a flowing gown.
Show me a psychic-type Pokemon that can teleport and has a nurturing personality.

distinctive_features: Distinctive head shape resembling a veil
